org.ow2.proactive.resourcemanager.frontend.topology

Interface Topology

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TopologyImpl

    @PublicAPI
public interface Topology
extends Serializable
    Interface represents hosts topology handled by resource manager. Users may receive the topology information using ResourceManager.getTopology() method.

    • Method Summary

      Returns the distance between 2 hosts identified by their domain names.

      Gets the set of hosts handled by resource manager.

      • getHostTopology

        HashMap<String,Long> getHostTopology(String hostName)
        Gets the distances associated to the host. Note that it does not return information about all hosts handled by the resource manager but rather the information about hosts added before the one specified.
        Parameters:
        hostName - - name of the host
        Returns:
        distances map to nodes added before this one

      • clusterize

        List<Cluster<String>> clusterize(int numberOfClusters,
                                 DistanceFunction distanceFunction)
        Clustirizes hosts into clusters based on their proximity
        Parameters:
        numberOfClusters - the number of clusters to produce
        distanceFunction - the function for distances recalculation
        Returns:
        the list of host clusters
